text: muḥmiṉkaḷē! Oru camūkattār piṟiyatoru camūkattāraip parikācam ceyya vēṇṭām. Ēṉeṉil (parikacikkappaṭuvōr), avarkaḷaiviṭa mēlāṉavarkaḷāka irukkalām; (avvāṟē) entap peṇkaḷum, maṟṟentap peṇkaḷaiyum (parikācam ceyya vēṇṭām) - ēṉeṉil ivarkaḷ avarkaḷai viṭa mēlāṉavarkaḷāka irukkalām; iṉṉum, uṅkaḷil oruvarukkoruvar paḻittuk koḷḷātīrkaḷ, iṉṉum (uṅkaḷil) oruvaraiyoruvar (tīya) paṭṭappeyarkaḷāl aḻaikkātīrkaḷ; īmāṉ koṇṭapiṉ (avvāṟu tīya) paṭṭap peyar cūṭṭuvatu mikak keṭṭatākum; evarkaḷ (ivaṟṟiliruntu) mīḷavillaiyō, attakaiyavarkaḷ aniyāyakkārarkaḷ āvārkaḷ
